item.description:
Learn all about 4s and strengths, defenses, limitations. Learn about all the subtypes of 4, personal growth strategies, relationship dynamics in relationship to 4s. Great to attend if you are in relationship with a 4 or just want to be more like a 4. I will attempt to have male 4s attend also.


7:30 pm - 9:30 pm
($40 - Sliding scale to $20)

Herb Pearce, M.Ed., is an Enneagram expert, author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram and has taught 2000 workshops on this topic. He is a therapist and personal coach and his coming out with a new eBook on Herb's Tips for Living: A Manual for Enjoying Yourself on the Earth.

www.herbpearce.com
herb@herbpearce.com
781 648 3737
item.name: Type 4, Depth Seeker, Workshop - also, How to Relate to 4s
